Coronavirus in Texas: Eanes closes schools through April 5
Students and staff should not return to campuses until they are notified. During this two-week period, all Eanes facilities will be closed for instruction and all other functions until further notice, including UIL events, athletics, rentals, field trips, after-school programs, childcare and other campus activities, the news release said.
